prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles two hands emerging from a rock.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a dual-handed creature with a rugged stone base.
Generate a unique Pokemon inspired by coastal environments with a rocky appearance.
Make a bipedal Pokemon with two hands and a rocky body, perfect for aquatic habitats.
Imagine a Pokemon that has hands instead of normal arms and is found in wetlands.
Design a playful Pokemon that resembles a rock with hands, ideal for sea adventures.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of water and earth elements in its design.
